Tunable.name: conflict_trait_tooltip
Tunable.description: Tooltip to display if the trait is conflict with any other trait that is already equipped on sim.

Tunable.name: existing_trait_tooltip
Tunable.description: Tooltip to display if the trait is already exist on sim.

Tunable.name: invalid_trait_tooltip
Tunable.description: Tooltip to display if the trait is conflict with sim's age or gender.
